tool_description: Crypto prices API is an API that provides updates on the status of your favorite crypto coins. It's designed to be used by developers who are building apps and websites that need to know the information on a cryptocurrency.
title: Crypto Prices API

api_list.name: Prices and up and down
api_list.description: Here you can fetch the data using this rest endpoint
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-prices-api.p.rapidapi.com/prices"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-prices-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
